bibl.title: Book-Ends and Book-Layout in Papyri with Hexametric Poetry.

series.title: American Studies in Papyrology. Special Edition

bibl.note: Brief summary of: Τὸ μέγα βιβλίον. Book-Ends, End-Titles, and Coronides in Papyri with Hexametric Poetry = American Studies in Papyrology. 48 (Durham, North Carolina, 2010). - Collecting the Data: Papyri Analyzed. - Evidence Available, Problems and Methodology. - End-marks. - Book layout. - Methodology. - Results. - Paragraphos & Coronis in Rolls. - End-titles in Rolls. - Ptolemaic and Very Early Roman Papyri. - Reclamantes. - Paragraphos & Coronis in Codices. - End-titles in Codices. - Books Organization in Rolls and Codices. - Manuscripts Considered [Nos 1-55].

bibl.title: Adam HYATT (Assistant Editor), Proceedings of the 25th International Congress of Papyrology. Ann Arbor, July 29 - August 4, 2007

bibl.seg: SCHIRONI Francesca, Book-Ends and Book-Layout in Papyri with Hexametric Poetry.

Traianos GAGOS (Editor), Adam HYATT (Assistant Editor), Proceedings of the 25th International Congress of Papyrology. Ann Arbor, July 29 - August 4, 2007 = American Studies in Papyrology. Special Edition (Ann Arbor, 2010) pp. 695-704, 1 tabl.

Brief summary of: Τὸ μέγα βιβλίον. Book-Ends, End-Titles, and Coronides in Papyri with Hexametric Poetry = American Studies in Papyrology. 48 (Durham, North Carolina, 2010). - Collecting the Data: Papyri Analyzed. - Evidence Available, Problems and Methodology. - End-marks. - Book layout. - Methodology. - Results. - Paragraphos & Coronis in Rolls. - End-titles in Rolls. - Ptolemaic and Very Early Roman Papyri. - Reclamantes. - Paragraphos & Coronis in Codices. - End-titles in Codices. - Books Organization in Rolls and Codices. - Manuscripts Considered [Nos 1-55].
